name: 沈耀明
objective: 資料表示法：定點系統(Fixed Point System)，浮點系統(Floating Point System)，2.運算工作：定點之加減乘除，快速之運算，浮點運算，3.指令與控制：各種指令介紹，中斷，硬體控制單元設計(Hardwired Control)，微程式控制單元設計(Microprogramming)，4.記憶系統：記憶體之層次 (Memory Hierarchy)，虛擬記憶系統 (Virtual memory)，快速記憶 (Cache Memory)。
schedule:
Week	Date    Subjects	
1	       2/28	    228紀念日放假	
2	       3/7	    Ch1a. Introduction to Computer Organization	
3	      3/14	    Ch1b. Introduction to Computer Organization	
4	      3/21	    Ch1c. Introduction to Computer Organization	
5	      3/28	    Ch2a. Data Representation in Computer Systems	
6	      4/4	    兒童節放假	
7	     4/11	    Ch2b. Data Representation in Computer Systems	
8	     4/18	    Ch3a. Boolean Algebra and Digital Logic	
9	     4/25	    Midterm Test期中考
10	     5/2	    Ch3b. Boolean Algebra and Digital Logic	
11	     5/9	    Ch3c. Boolean Algebra and Digital Logic	
12	     5/16	    Ch4a. An Introduction to a Simple Computer	
13	     5/23	    Ch4b An Introduction to a Simple Computer	
14	     5/30	    Ch5a. A Closer Look at Instruction Set Architectures	
15	     6/6	    Ch5b. A Closer Look at Instruction Set Architectures	
16	     6/13	    Ch6a. Memory	
17	     6/20	    Ch6b. Memory	
18	     6/27	    Final Test 期末考
scorePolicy:
1.	期中考佔35%
2.	期末考佔45%
3.	作業佔10%, 每次佔5%, 遲交一天扣0.5%.
4.	課堂表現佔10%, 每缺席一次扣1%, 遲到早退扣0.5%, 缺席達3次者本項分數為0%. 表現優異者隨時加分最高10%, 表現不好者隨時扣分最高10%,.
5.	最後再依比率調整, 以符合學校規定的最高平均分數上限.
materials:
本學期使用的課本:
書名: The Essentials of Computer Organization and Architecture 3/e
作者: Linda Null and Julia Lobur
代理商: 東華書局
連絡人: 儲方
